summary: Completed comprehensive testing of CareerIQ v3.0 - All backend APIs and frontend flows working correctly
passed_tests: Health endpoint returns version 3.0
Root endpoint returns version 3.0
/api/capture-lead - Successfully captures lead with all required fields
/api/capture-lead - Correctly rejects missing full_name (422)
/api/capture-lead - Correctly rejects invalid email format (422)
/api/capture-lead - Correctly rejects name that is too short (422)
/api/upload - Accepts resume upload without LinkedIn (v3.0 optional LinkedIn)
/api/upload - Accepts both resume and LinkedIn upload
/api/upload - Correctly rejects upload without lead_id (422)
/api/upload - Correctly rejects invalid lead_id (404)
/api/create-order - Creates order for ₹499 tier with correct amount (49900 paise)
/api/create-order - Creates order for ₹2999 tier with correct amount (299900 paise)
/api/create-order - Creates order for ₹4999 tier with correct amount (499900 paise)
/api/create-order - Correctly rejects invalid tier value (400)
/api/create-order - Correctly rejects invalid lead_id (404)
/api/razorpay-key - Returns valid Razorpay test key
/api/report - Returns 404 for non-existent session
/api/verify-payment - Correctly rejects incomplete payment verification (422)
/api/analyze - Correctly requires payment before analysis (402)
/api/analyze - Correctly rejects invalid session_id (404)
Complete v3.0 flow: capture-lead -> upload -> create-order works end-to-end
Frontend: Landing page loads correctly with all tier options
Frontend: 3-step progress indicator (Details -> Upload -> Payment)
Frontend: Step 1 form has all required fields (Full Name, Phone, Email, Current Role, Target Role, Consent)
Frontend: Phone number defaults to +91
Frontend: Step 1 -> Step 2 navigation works correctly
Frontend: Step 2 shows Resume upload (required) and LinkedIn upload (optional)
Frontend: LinkedIn marked as optional with 'reduced confidence' warning
Frontend: All three tiers (₹499, ₹2999, ₹4999) order pages work
Frontend: Mobile responsive design works correctly
Frontend: Report page handles invalid sessions gracefully with redirect and error toast
critical_code_review_comments: v3.0 implementation is complete with all required features
ReportPage correctly implements Identity Block, Context Intro, Interpretation Anchors, Commitments with Market Defaults, and State Shift Summary
Backend properly validates lead capture before allowing file upload
LinkedIn is correctly marked as optional with confidence penalty logic
seed_data_creation: Test data created with TEST_ prefix during pytest runs
context_for_next_testing_agent: CareerIQ v3.0 is fully functional. The new 3-step order flow (Details -> Upload -> Payment) with pre-payment lead capture is working. LinkedIn upload is optional with confidence penalty. All three tiers (₹499, ₹2999, ₹4999) are working. The ReportPage has all v3.0 features including Identity Block, Commitments with Market Defaults, and State Shift Summary for ₹4999 tier. Backend test file at /app/tests/test_careeriq_v3.py can be reused for regression testing.
